page.title: 14A Pupil on holiday
page.content: Last year in the{summer holidays}of 1984 my sister Gemma,and I,went to our Granny's.She lives in a little town called Golspie on the north east coast of Scotland.On the 16th July I got up at 9.15 to go{golfing}with my third cousin. We took about an hour and a half.After we had finished we went to the clubhouse for some refreshment and a game of pool.In the afternoon after lunch I went{swimming}and after that I played{tennis}with some friends I made the day before.Once I came back to the house Granny asked me would I go shopping before dinner.It took me about half an hour to get everything she wanted.After tea I watched television and read the paper.
